item.description:
NHCer Eduardo would like to invite you to join him and celebrate his big 40th(?) birthday.

If you would like to please Honor Him with your Presence at Incas Restaurant in Milford this Saturday at 7:00 P.M. for Dinner. 

Incas offers Delicious Peruvian Food and Latin-American Music atmosphere.  The Restaurant is BYOB with a $5 "Corking Fee", so if you want something to drink other than Water be sure to bring it with you.

Please RSVP early and hold to it, as Eduardo will need to be making a reservation.

Eduardo will give further contact information as the date approaches.

Happy Birthday Eduardo!
item.how_to_find_us: Contact Eduardo, He'll leave contact information as the date gets closer.
item.name: Eduardo's Big Birthday!
